resources.string: Sign of the Cross and Creed
Oh my Jesus! Forgive us and deliver us from the fires of hell. Lead all souls to heaven and succor especially most in need.

Divine Jesus, we offer you this rosary which let us pray, meditating on the mysteries of Thy Redemption. Grant us, through the intercession of the Virgin Mary, Mother of God and our Mother, the virtues we are required to recite it well and earn the grace of indulgences of the holy devotion.

Infinite thanks give you, Sovereign Queen, by benefits all day Liberals received at your hands. Deign to now and forever take us under your powerful for more support and you require us welcome with a Hail Mary ...
Select the mystery (Default: Mystery of the day)
